definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (orig. n.pr. div. acc. to RS:Sem i. 91, 2nd ed, 93);—

definitions.title: Og
definitions.body: , giant king of Bashan (i. e., peculiarly, of a country, v. RS:1.c.), usu. + [[מִיחוֹן]] (q.v.); Nu 21:33 (JE), Nu 32:33 (P), De 1:4, De 3:1, De 3:3, De 3:4, De 3:10, De 3:11, De 3:13, De 4:47, De 29:6, De 31:4, Jos 2:10, Jos 9:10, Jos 12:4, Jos 13:12, Jos 13:30, Jos 13:3 (prob. all D), 1Ki 4:19, Ne 9:22, Ps 135:11, Ps 136:20; LXX (Wg (Twg B De 3:1, De 4:47).
